SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.JOB_DLBRT_NO , A.JOB_SE_CODE , C.CODE_NM AS JOB_SE_CODE_NM , A.JOB_DLBRT_NM , A.JOB_DLBRT_CN , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.REMARK , B.JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_CODE , D.CODE_NM AS JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_CODE_NM , B.JOB_DLBRT_CN AS JOB_FNL_DLBRT_CN , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM TN_JOB_DLBRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT JOB_DLBRT_NO , JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_CODE , JOB_DLBRT_CN FROM TN_JOB_DLBRT_RESULT WHERE JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_NO IN (SELECT MAX(A.JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_NO) FROM TN_JOB_DLBRT_RESULT A , TN_JOB_DLBRT B WHERE B.JOB_DLBRT_NO = A.JOB_DLBRT_NO GROUP BY A.JOB_DLBRT_NO)) B ON A.JOB_DLBRT_NO = B.JOB_DLBRT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NM, CODE FROM TC_CMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'BO001') C ON A.JOB_SE_CODE = C.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NM, CODE FROM TC_CMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'BO002') D ON B.JOB_DLBRT_RESULT_CODE = D.CODE WHERE 1=1
A.JOB_DLBRT_NO LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
A.JOB_DLBRT_NM LIKE concat('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')

A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM >= #searchKeywordFrom#
A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM <= concat(#searchKeywordTo#,' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY A.JOB_DLBRT_NO DESC
) ALL_LIST ) C LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
